summary: A tough, cute woman and a cyborg arrive at a depopulated, post WW3 Times Sq. They leave the ruins of NYC with 2 on a secret mission.
cast: Yuka Komatsu|Jun'ichi Suwabe|Aoi Yûki|Hiroki Takahashi|Hiroki Touchi|Kaori Nazuka|Katsunosuke Hori|Tesshô Genda|Elizabeth Bunch|Wendel Calvert|Luci Christian|Adam Gibbs|Chris Hutchinson|David Matranga|Brina Palencia|Josh Sheltz
title: Appleseed Alpha
